name: Raj Agrawal
about: I'm a passionate developer with experience in building full-stack applications.
My journey in web development started with a curiosity for creating beautiful and functional websites.
I specialize in JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Node.js, and modern web technologies. I'm always learning and exploring new technologies to stay at the forefront of web development.

projects.title: Project 1
projects.description: A full-stack web application built with Next.js and Node.js
projects.details: This project features authentication, a REST API, and a beautiful UI. It is deployed on Vercel and uses PostgreSQL for data storage.

projects.title: Project 2
projects.description: Mobile-first responsive website with modern animations
projects.details: Built with React and Tailwind CSS, this site is fully responsive and features smooth animations and accessibility best practices.

projects.title: Project 3
projects.details: A chat app with real-time messaging, user presence, and emoji support. Built with Node.js, WebSocket, and MongoDB.
